tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Smiles at Erragadda location HYD: I could say only pro’s about it. I have approached for a difficult wisdom tooth extraction.

1. Detailed diagnosis of your dental issues
2. Very well explanation from Doctor Rahul on how will be the treatment, what are possible ways to treat
3. Unlike other hospitals, Dr. Rahul and team will give you what are the risks also seen openly
4. The staff of hospital will do own follow ups on how are we feeling, Taking medicines, reminds about next follow up visit, after surgery care
5. Available on one stop call if we have any queries later too
6. No hidden and surprise cost and charges too

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Good listener firstly.. his approach towards the treatment then the way he explained me about my situation and the treatment plan .. which made me confident with his treatment plan .. he's just good at his work and the way he handled my situation was very good...
Had come for RCT treatment and Crown .. had got it done smoothly. Very happy and thankq Dr Rahul and team
